# INWorkoutGoalUnitTypeResolutionResult

**Class**

A resolution result for the units of a workout goal.

## Declaration

```swift
class INWorkoutGoalUnitTypeResolutionResult
```

## Overview

An [doc://com.apple.sirikit/documentation/Intents/INWorkoutGoalUnitTypeResolutionResult] object is what you return when resolving parameters that contain a [doc://com.apple.sirikit/documentation/Intents/INWorkoutGoalUnitType] value. Use the creation method that best reflects your ability to successfully resolve the parameter. For additional resolution options, see [doc://com.apple.sirikit/documentation/Intents/INIntentResolutionResult].

## Creating a Resolution Result Object

- **success(with:)**: Creates an object whose resolution involves successfully matching the specified parameter.
- **confirmationRequired(with:)**: Creates an object whose resolution requires the user to confirm the workout unit goal value before proceeding.

## Resolution Results

- **INWorkoutLocationTypeResolutionResult**: A resolution result for the location type where the workout occurs.

## Inherits From

- INIntentResolutionResult

## Conforms To

- CVarArg
- CustomDebugStringConvertible
- CustomStringConvertible
- Equatable
- Hashable
- NSObjectProtocol
